level.heading: Grace period for establishing residency.
level.text: An individual or family seeking shelter during severe weather conditions may be afforded a 3-day grace period to establish District residency.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 5102 of Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-383, June 19, 2012, 59 DCR 7764).
For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 5102 of Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-413, July 25, 2012, 59 DCR 9290).
